text: Lacta is a Brazilian chocolate and confectionery maker, founded in São Paulo in 1912 as Société Anonyme des Chocolats Suisses. In 1996, Lacta was purchased by Kraft Foods. Lacta is currently owned and distributed in Brazil by Mondelez International. == References == ==External links== * Official site (in Portuguese) Category:Brazilian chocolate companies Category:Defunct companies of Brazil Category:Food and drink companies established in 1912 Category:Mondelez International Category:1912 establishments in Brazil Category:Manufacturing companies based in São Paulo Category:Chocolate bars
title: Lacta (Brazilian company)
